posts.post_title: SOLD T205 x77+ w/ HOFs, Beantown Beatdown
posts.post_content:
These show major flaws, some are Fair, none are Good, all show nice color.  No rarities here, so offer accordingly. Authenticity only guaranteed. Stack of real trolls included.

I may not be able to respond to all emails. Plz send a reasonable offer to; [url]fdnyladder7@comcast.net[/url]

Includes all that is in image. Sale will be determined when I say it is. Feel free to contact me directly! Gracie, Steve
